department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The work covered under this project at Skinner’s Cove consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment, hardware and materials for the reconstruction of a crib style wharf and rubble mound breakwater.
description: Reconstruction of breakwater at Skinner’s Cove, including provision of labour, equipment, and materials. Estimated cost: $1,000,000 to $5,000,000.00. 28 weeks expected completion time.
full_summary:
# ITT - Skinner’s Cove - East Breakwater Reconstruction

## Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to undertake the reconstruction of the east breakwater and a crib-style wharf at Skinner’s Cove. The contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, hardware, and materials for the project.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3715820795-Doc3715840056
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3715820795
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-17T14:00:00 EST

## Project Timeline
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-11-23
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-11-23
* **Project Duration:** 28 weeks

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Project Location
The project will be located in Skinner’s Cove, Nova Scotia.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) through the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

## Contact Information
For all inquiries and bids, please contact:
* Richard Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14421768?extsite=MTQ0MjE3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Estimated Cost
The estimated cost of this procurement is between $1,000,000 and $5,000,000.00 CAD.
